author: Sam Goldfarb
title: Dollar Gains Against Yen as Riskier Assets Rebound
text:
The U.S. dollar climbed against the yen Wednesday, reversing early losses as investors bet that the U.S. and China can overcome rising trade tensions.
The dollar was up 0.2% against the yen to Â¥106.77 in late afternoon trading in New York. The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was down less than 0.1% to 83.86.
